Articles.Content:
No, seriously, I HATE you:

my apartment before KSP

My apartment NOW

....not to mention that I have slept 4 hours in the last 5 days, but hey, I finally managed to dock the friggin' Rockomax jumbo fuel tank to my pet space station, so I feel life's been good to me so far.

Bye

Max
"Five days?" I've been playing this game almost exclusively for close to 2 years.
Welcome to the Club. Rehab is to your left, but we suggest turning right and heading for the MOAR BOOSTERS! lounge.

You still look up from your computer to see your apartment?

N00b.

You still look up from your computer to see your apartment?

N00b.

Hahahahahaha....I lol'd hard because that was my first thought as well

You still look up from your computer to see your apartment?

N00b.

You know, I had to: a dog-sized roach complained for the stench.

Then he took a look at the monitor, said something like "staged rocket to reach Mun? N00B!" and now he's the one who's playing...

You guys live in an apartment?

NOOBS!

I still live with my parents!
LOL... KSP is the REAL Special K.

What is this life you speak of?

I only know how to KERBAL!

Someone has got to make a meme out of this.

Hey. Welcome to the forums.

Once you KSP, you can never KSP. It's addictive.

You guys live in an apartment?

NOOBS!

I still live with my parents!

Not fair! I moved out long before KSP. Heck, I moved out before WWW.

You guys and your silly "moving out".

I haven't left my bedroom in the past five months!

You guys and your silly "moving out".

I haven't left my bedroom in the past five months!

Training for a trip to mars?

And welcome to the forums, Max!

You're all noobs. My parents kicked me out, and I live in a roadside ditch! I love wireless wi-fi!

Welcome!

You guys live in a house?

I don't know where I live. I can't be bothered to look up to check. I think there are stray cats in here.

You're all noobs. My parents kicked me out, and I live in a roadside ditch! I love wireless wi-fi!

Welcome!

Lol'd, I think that was the best.

Or the other one above.
A bunch of n00bs! I haven't left my room in a year, I have NASA deliver snacks for me by an Atlas rocket. Also, who needs toilets anyway? I have my trusty pe*bucket!
Yall are noobs. I haggle a life while landing on the Mun AT THE SAME TIME! What do you think I do in class all day? Thank God for high performance laptops!
Welcome fellow kerbal . Ps you will turn green and get a big head
So you're descending into madness? Here, have some music.

I raise you guys one.

But at least my room is somewhat neat:

Lies. My room was bad before I stared kerbaling, and still is. I should go to something about it.

On that subject, remember, KSP should always be there, but real life has demands and deadlines. Pay attention to it. This has been a totally not hypocritical community service announcement by some random guy on the internet, who knows it's up to each individual to decide how to run their own life.

Edited April 23, 2014 by Tw1
Well I've been playing since 0.8, Since then I went from a straight A and B Student to C and D student, Thanks KSP

I raise you guys one.

But at least my room is somewhat neat:

http://i.imgur.com/HxZKHuc.png

Lies. My room was bad before I stared kerbaling, and still is. I should go to something about it.

On that subject, remember, KSP should always be there, but real life has demands and deadlines. Pay attention to it. This has been a totally not hypocritical community service announcement by some random guy on the internet, who knows it's up to each individual to decide how to run their own life.

This is awesome. Download link please?

I raise you guys one.

-snip-

...welp, now I know what my planned base on Minmus is gonna look like

This is awesome. Download link please?

Sure. Wasn't sure which one you were interested in, so here's both:

The house, which requires Lack Luster Labs. Hopefully the parts are still the same.(This was a prop for my ARR.)

https://www.dropbox.com/s/b9bd0bf7mfenoei/Watsan%27s%20house.craft

The Room, that I made just for that comment, all stock KSP.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/ep9568s8ypw7wei/Random%20room.craft

Edited April 23, 2014 by Tw1
